GK19gp01-11u:1545: svapnas tat kim u jāgaraḥ kim athavety etan na niścīyate satyaṃ brūhi sadharmiṇi sphurati kiṃ so' yaṃ tavāpy antare ||JGc_1,3.21||
GK19gp01-11u:1546: [55] sovāca-śrīman ! mamāpīyam eva mano-vṛttir mati-vṛttim ativartamānā vartate |
GK19gp01-11u:1547: kevala-vilajjayā taj jātu bhavantaṃ na nivedayāmi |
GK19gp01-11u:1548: tasmād asmād asambhava-manorathān nivṛtti-śāstra-vicāram udyacchantau mana eva
GK19gp01-11u:1550: [56] sa uvāca-yadyapi mayāpy etad eva madhye madhye sphuṭam adhyavasīyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1551: tathāpy astoko vaśita-viśvodreko mahān sahāyaḥ śrīman-nārāyaṇa-deva eva śaraṇam iti citta-vṛttiḥ parivartate-yo' smākam adṛṣṭāśrutam idaṃ dṛṣṭam iva karoti |
GK19gp01-11u:1552: sa sarvaṃ kṛta-pūrvī tad api kurvīta |
GK19gp01-11u:1553: [57] sovāca-deva ! tasya devasya kām api sevāyogyām evātra yogyām upalabhāmahe |
GK19gp01-11u:1559: tasmād adyārabhya samārabhyatām eṣa vrata iti |
GK19gp01-11u:1560: [61] tad evaṃ sampravadamānayor udbhavan deva-dundubhi-nādaḥ sarvam aticakrām |
GK19gp01-11u:1563: śrīmatī vrajapati-patnī ca mahā-nīlamaṇi-maya-nāyakaṃ hāraṃ vihāpayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:1564: [63] atha sotkaṇṭhaṃ snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-tarhi kiṃ jātam ?
GK19gp01-11u:1565: [64] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tena vratena pūrṇe varṣe bṛṃhite ca tarṣe yugapad eva deva-devaḥ svapne tayor āvirbabhūva, covāca ca-aho ! mayy atisaktau bhaktau kathaṃ nirvidya khidyāthe ? yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ śaśvad evānubhavator bhavatoḥ kumāratayā sphurati sa tu sadā bhavator evānugataḥ pratikalpaṃ svabhakti-pravartanāya divi
GK19gp01-11u:1567: ādi-rītyā brahmādy-alabhya-sākṣāt-tat-phala-sākṣātkārāya svayam eva pṛthivyāṃ bhavator bhavator eva bhavaṃ labhata eva æ acirād eva ca rucirā rucireṣā yuvayoḥ saphalatāṃ valitā [65] tad evaṃ śrāvitābhihite tirohite ca paramahite bhagavati
GK19gp01-11u:1568: labdha-jāgarāv upalabdhāmṛta-sāgarāv iva ca mithas tad eva saṅkathayantau
GK19gp01-11u:1570: [66] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svagataṃ cintayāmāsa-tad evaṃ jātāny eva mama praśnānām uttārāṇi
GK19gp01-11u:1571: tatra ca bhavator eveti yuktam evoktaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1572: śrī-bhagavatā--prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [10.8.14] iti
GK19gp01-11u:1573: vadato' py avyabhicāra-vacaḥ-pracāra-sargasya muneḥ śrī-gargasya prāyaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1577: atas tad-viśeṣasya tad-viśeṣa eva hetuḥ-ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ādeḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1578: tatas tasmin vatsatāṃ satāṃ vātsalyābhidha eva premā pramāpayati |
GK19gp01-11u:1579: [68] tatra śrī-vasudevasya tad-aiśvaryālocanena vātsalyasya tāralyaṃ sāralyaṃ cāsāditam
GK19gp01-11u:1580: śrī-vrajarājasya punas tad-vātsalyaṃ śaśvad udbuddhaṃ śuddham eva ca prasiddham |
GK19gp01-11u:1581: pitṛbhyāṃ putratayā tad-dhāraṇe kāraṇaṃ ca munibhir mana eva manyate |
GK19gp01-11u:1589: tatra ca sati sāmprataṃ tu viśeṣata eva sāmprataṃ parāvasthām anu kṛtāsaktau hi bhaktau tad-udayaḥ syāt |
GK19gp01-11u:1590: tasmāt tavaivātmajas tasya vasudevasya tu kvacit kārye nimitte jātaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ iti |
GK19gp01-11u:1592: [70] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evaṃ paramārter upakaṇṭhatāṃ prāptāyām utkaṇṭhāyām ekadā sarve' narvācīnā vraja-vāsinaḥ sabhāvāḥ sabhāyāṃ militāḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1593: | militvā ca tad eva sotkaṇṭhaṃ suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuvuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1594: [71] tadā ca tatraikā tāpasī kenacana snātakena samam āyātā |
GK19gp01-11u:1595: tāṃ ca mahā-prabhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ lakṣayitvā sarve samutthāyātithyam āvitathyena vidhāya vijñāpayāmāsuḥ-sākṣād bhagavato yogamāyeva kā tvam asi ?
GK19gp01-11u:1597: [72] sā ca sahāsam āha sma-paurṇamāsī-nāmnī kātyāyanī ca kumāra-śramaṇā ca pārikāṅkṣiṇī cekṣaṇikā cāsmi |
GK19gp01-11u:1600: āvāṃ ca vidyā-viśeṣeṇaitad-vayaskāv eva sadā vidyāvahe |
GK19gp01-11u:1601: [73] te ūcuḥ-etāvatī kṛpā kṛpaṇeṣu katham asmāsu kṛtā ?
GK19gp01-11u:1604: [76] sovāca-bhavatāṃ prāṇa-kandasya śrīman-nandasya jagadānandaḥ sa khalu
GK19gp01-11u:1606: [77] sarve sa-bāṣpa-pulaka-kulam ūcuḥ-bṛhad-vanam asmākam ida bṛhat-tīrthaṃ bhavati |
GK19gp01-11u:1607: tasmād asmabhyaṃ datta-viśrāntike kṛṣṇāntike sphuṭam uṭajaṃ tava ghaṭayāmaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1608: [78] sovāca-upaśrutir eṣā śruti-veṣā navyāpi na vyabhicaritā |
GK19gp01-11u:1609: yataḥ kṛṣṇāyā iti vivakṣitam api kṛṣṇasyeti lakṣitaṃ karoti |
GK19gp01-11u:1611: mahā-prabhāvavati yasmin jātavati nirdānavatā pṛthivyāṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK19gp01-11u:1612: tadīya-guṇe tu sadā navatā, saguṇatā vidyādi-prabandhe
GK19gp01-11u:1614: sakiñcanatā viṣaya-sampattau tad-bhaktau tu niṣkiñcanatā ity ādikaṃ viruddhāyamānam api sarvair anuruddhaṃ kariṣyati |
GK19gp01-11u:1615: tasmād asmākam atra sthātum āgraha eva bhavatām anugrahāya sampannaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1616: [79] atha tāṃ sarve sānandaṃ vandamānās tayā samam
GK19gp01-11u:1617: indīvara-ruci-nindīhita-kālindīṃ vindamānāḥ parṇa-mandiraṃ pūrṇayantas tatra vāsayāmāsuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1618: [80] tasminn eva divase' pagata-doṣe pradoṣe samudbhaṭa-kaṃsa-roṣeṇa
GK19gp01-11u:1625: iva saṅgata-saṅge parasparaṃ parebhyaś ca sukha-samūham ūhatuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1626: [81] vraja-rāja-patnī ca tasyā jyaiṣṭham avaṣṭabhya māsa-traya-jātam
GK19gp01-11u:1629: rajanyāṃ sā vraja-rājaṃ sevyamānā tandrāparatantrāyamāṇā svapna-tulyatā-saṃcitaṃ kiñcid añcitaṃ dadarśa |
GK19gp01-11u:1630: [83] yathā sa eva bālaḥ sarvatas tad-āvaraṇa-kārikayā kayācic
GK19gp01-11u:1631: divya-kumārikayātmānaṃ pidhāya vraja-rāja-hṛdayān nija-hṛdayaṃ praviśya dṛśyavad eva sthita iti |
GK19gp01-11u:1635: vrajarājaś ca nirantara-svāntara-tat-praveśāveśaṃ durnideśaṃ ciram anubhūya dūyamānatāṃ vidhūya tathaivānubhūtavān |
GK19gp01-11u:1636: [84] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svānte cintayati sma-satyam etad ata eva
GK19gp01-11u:1637: sad-vāṇī-guṇibhir muhur anayor ātmaja iti matam |
GK19gp01-11u:1638: mayā ca suvicāratas tad eva pūrvaṃ niścitam ācaritam iti |
GK19gp01-11u:1640: [85] madhukaṇṭha uvāca - atha tad ārabhya garbha-lakṣaṇam upalabhya
GK19gp01-11u:1644: mukham āpāṇḍu kucāgraṃ sphītaṃ jaṭharaṃ darottuṅgam |
GK19gp01-11u:1647: vraja-rājñyāṃ sphuritātmā kṛṣṇaḥ sphurati sma loke' pi |
GK19gp01-11u:1648: dīpaḥ sphaṭika-ghaṭī-bhāg antar bahir api vibhāti tat-tulyaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1651: spṛhitaṃ kiñcit kiñcid vraja-nṛpa-gṛhiṇī tadā cakre ||JGc_1,3.24||
GK19gp01-11u:1655: [86] atha yogamāyā rohiṇyāḥ sāptamāsikaṃ garbhaṃ srastaṃ vidhāya devakyās tad-vidhaṃ taṃ tasyāṃ niyojayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:1656: tataś ca labdha-sarva-samaya-sampad-daśe caturdaśe māsi śrāvaṇataḥ prāk
GK19gp01-11u:1659: sāndra-śubhratā-vibhrājamānatayā paurṇamāsī candramasam iva, darśita-vikrama-kramatayā siṃha-vadhūḥ śāvakam iva,
GK19gp01-11u:1666: tat tac ca yuktaṃ sa hi divya-bālakaḥ ||JGc_1,3.26||
GK19gp01-11u:1667: [87] sa eṣa ca asita-varṣmā sita-varṣmā sad-anujaḥ sūdita-danujaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:1669: rāma-nāmā rāma-ramita-dvivida-vidārayitā ca bhavitā iti jyotirvidbhir udbhāvitam |
GK19gp01-11u:1670: [88] asya jātakarmādikaṃ ca marmagair eva śarmāntanāmabhir guptam eva paryāptam akāri ānaka-dundubhi-mantraṇā-paratantratayā
GK19gp01-11u:1672: [89] yataḥ sa tu janmata evānuja-janma yāvat jaḍa evādṛśyata |
GK19gp01-11u:1674: vrajeśvary-aṅkam eva kevalaṃ valamānaḥ samullasitaval lakṣyate |
GK19gp01-11u:1675: [90] tad evaṃ dina-katipaye labdha-vyatyaye garbha-sandarbhāt spaṣṭam
GK19gp01-11u:1678: aṣṭāviṃśa-catur-yuge kali-śiraḥ saṃmardya vaivasvate bhādrāntar-bahulāṣṭamīm anu vidhoḥ putre vidhor udgame |
GK19gp01-11u:1679: yoge harṣaṇa-nāmni śuddha-vidhibhe purṇaḥ paraḥ śrī-vidhur
GK19gp01-11u:1680: nandan nanda-vadhū-mude svayam udaid ahnāya dhunvaṃs tamaḥ ||JGc_1,3.27||
GK19gp01-11u:1685: vibabhūva vinā satyaṃ dhyānaṃ tretāṃ vinā makhaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1686: vinā dvāparam abhyarcā harer nāma kaliṃ vinā ||
GK19gp01-11u:1688: vinā śarad-ambu-śrīḥ śālis tasyāḥ paraṃ vinā ||
GK19gp01-11u:1692: vinā sūti-pratītyā ca prasūto' sau yaśodayā ||JGc_1,3.29||
GK19gp01-11u:1700: jātibhiḥ saha mādhavyaḥ ketakyaḥ ketakaiḥ samam |
GK19gp01-11u:1701: kumūdyāny ambujaiḥ sārdhaṃ sphuṭanti smeti dig yadā ||JGc_1,3.31||tadā tad api nāścaryam ācāryaiḥ paricīyate |
GK19gp01-11u:1702: sarvāścarya-nidhiḥ so' pi janma-caryāṃ yato gataḥ ||JGc_1,3.32||
GK19gp01-11u:1703: [92] tathā hi etad-uttaraṃ bhāvi-tad-vilokānāṃ lokānāṃ bhāvitānam -
GK19gp01-11u:1704: [93] mukham asya lasita-smitāsita-kamalānām adhipam iva vilokyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1721: kiṃ bahunā, svena mukundam apīti yugapad atra tat-tad-avasara-prasavādīnāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1722: tathā durlabha-sannidhīnāṃ nidhīnām api sannipatanaṃ nāsambhāvyam |
GK19gp01-11u:1723: [95] atha tasya janmani ko' pi viśeṣaḥ, yathā -
GK19gp01-11u:1726: sadā kurvatī taṃ samastān atītaṃ vidhāyāgrajātaṃ svayaṃ prāpa jātam ||JGc_1,3.33||
GK19gp01-11u:1727: [96] atha snigdhakaṇṭhena bhāvitaṃ sa-pramāṇaḥ khalv idam - adṛśyatānujā viṣṇoḥ sāyudhāṣṭa-mahābhujā [BhP 10.4.9] iti śrī-bhāgavatād, tac ca nandas
GK19gp01-11u:1728: tv ātmaja utpanne jātāhlādo mahā-manāḥ [BhP 10.5.1] ity ādiṣv ātmaja-padaiḥ sthāpanā-vyapadeśataḥ sadeśa-rūpam eva nirūpyate |
GK19gp01-11u:1729: kintu tad idam apracchannaṃ vivicya pṛcchāmaḥ yatheha sandehaḥ sarveṣāṃ śāmyati |
GK19gp01-11u:1730: [97] spaṣṭam apy ācaṣṭa - aho ārya tarhi kathaṃ vasudeva-devakī-putratayā
GK19gp01-11u:1732: [98] tad īdṛg-vacasi sati snigdhakaṇṭhe vacasi kiñcit-kuṇṭhena
GK19gp01-11u:1733: madhukaṇṭhena manasi bhāvitam - śrīmatā devarṣiṇedam āvāṃ praty atiharṣeṇādiṣṭaṃ - yadi kadācic chrīmati mahā-premavati vraje
GK19gp01-11u:1734: kṛta-vrajanayoḥ kathā-yogo bhavatoḥ sambhāvyate, tadā śrī-kṛṣṇa-devasya
GK19gp01-11u:1735: sarvato varṣyam aiśvaryaṃ gopanīyam ity ato
GK19gp01-11u:1737: sa cāmībhiḥ śruta eveti nāścaryāya paryavasiṣyatīti |
GK19gp01-11u:1738: [99] prakaṭaṃ covāca - atra khalv idam asya śrī-vraja-rāja-tanūjasya
GK19gp01-11u:1739: rahasyam udbhāvayato mama samatikramaḥ svayam amunaiva bāḍhaṃ soḍhavyaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:1740: tathā hi asmin sarvato labdhātirekakā saṃsiddhiḥ khalv ekā vartate |
GK19gp01-11u:1746: sneha-maya-sphūrti-pūrti-vaśībhāvata eva sarvathā, na tv anyathā |
GK19gp01-11u:1747: putratayāvirbhāve ca bījaṃ pitṛ-bhāva-maya-sneha eva nānyeṣām ivānyat |
GK19gp01-11u:1752: vraja-nṛpati-prabhṛtīnāṃ bhṛti-bhuk-paryantānāṃ vraja-janānāṃ yeṣām adhimadhyaṃ prati-dviparārdhaṃ pratikalpam āvirbhavati, vṛddhi-jīvikānām
GK19gp01-11u:1753: iva teṣām eva prema-sañcaya-paryudañcana-prapañcam añcaṃs tad-vṛddher
GK19gp01-11u:1754: aparicchedyatābuddhyā pratidātum adhyavasāyaṃ muñcan sadā putrāditayā sa eṣa virājate, nānye tu tatra kila tilam apy avakāśa-kālaṃ labhante |
GK19gp01-11u:1755: [101] etad evoktaṃ brahmaṇā eṣāṃ ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kiṃ deva rāteti naḥ [BhP 10.14.35] ity ādinā |
GK19gp01-11u:1757: samādiṣṭaṃ - yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ ity ādinā |
GK19gp01-11u:1763: mahīyamānasya yasya mahābhagavato yā yogamāyākhyā durghaṭa-ghañanī
GK19gp01-11u:1768: yadyapy asya tat-putrasya prāyo' vadhānaṃ na prāpnoti |
GK19gp01-11u:1769: tathāpi tasmād anyasmāc ca parokṣam anukṣaṇam anugatiṃ līlā-sahāyakaṃ ca prapañcati |
GK19gp01-11u:1770: yathā ca yogamāyā tathā tad-anugatā māyādayo' pīti |
GK19gp01-11u:1774: tad evaṃ sati bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te [BhP 10.8.15] ity api tad-uktir udriktīsyāt
GK19gp01-11u:1775: sva-snigdha-jana-bhajana-rasāveśitāveśatayā sadā virājamānasya śrīmad-vraja-rājātmajasya khalv asya sva-snigdha-jana-bhāva-svabhāva-viśeṣa-vinodam anumodamānasya
GK19gp01-11u:1778: [102] tataḥ śrī-vasudeva-devakyor antar yac caturbhujam asya rūpaṃ sphurati, tad eva hi bahir āvirbhavati sma |
GK19gp01-11u:1781: tenaiva ca nyāyena śrī-vrajeśvaryos tu paraṃ dvibhuja-mūrtitayā sphūrtir āsīt |
GK19gp01-11u:1782: tataḥ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti
GK19gp01-11u:1787: śrī-devakīcchā jātā, tadā tasya yad apūrvaṃ dvibhuja-rūpaṃ pūrvaṃ māyayā saha śrī-yaśodāyāḥ svāntaram āyātaṃ, tad eva tatra sannidhānam avāpya caturbhujaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya svayam āvirbabhūva |
GK19gp01-11u:1788: yatra sākāratayā mātṛ-garbha-sthitāpi māyā nirākāratayā tūrdhva-gatyā tanvā tad-vāhanatām
GK19gp01-11u:1790: gandavāha-śreṇī nīla-kamala-dalam iva tatra sarvālakṣitatayā tat prāpitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:1791: yā khalu pūrvaṃ tad-ākarṣeṇa dharṣeṇa paraṃ mātaram api mohena mlāpitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:1792: [103] atha punas tena garbhasthenākāreṇa mātuḥ prasūti-bhramaṃ ca samprathayya bahir ātmanaṃ saṃvalayya prasūti-śayyām evādhiśayya sthitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:1793: yā khalu śrī-devakītaḥ śrī-rohiṇyāṃ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṅkramaṇe' pi tathā prakramate sma iti |
GK19gp01-11u:1794: [104] atra ca snigdhakaṇṭhenāntaś cintitam - satyam evāha sma nūnaṃ athāham aṃśabhāgena [BhP 10.29] iti hi māyāṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyam
GK19gp01-11u:1795: ādiṣṭā prabhuṇāṃśena kāryārthe sambhaviṣyati [BhP 10.1.25] iti ca devān
GK19gp01-11u:1799: kāryārthe tat-tan-mohanāya aṃśena sambhaviṣyati śrī-kṛṣṇasya dvibhuja-rūpeṇākāra-bhedena saha miliṣyati seti brahmaṇo'
GK19gp01-11u:1801: tad evam eva hi vyākhyātam anyatra śrī-bhāgavata-tattvavidbhiḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1802: avatīrṇau jagaty-arthe svāṃśena bala-keśavau [BhP 10.38.32] ity atra svāṃśena mūrti-bhedeneti
GK19gp01-11u:1803: [105] api ca śrī-vrajeśvara-sambandha-nibandhanā yā kṛṣṇe yogamāyābhivyaktir uktā sā siddhāntato' pi siddhatām āsīdati |
GK19gp01-11u:1804: bhagavataḥ khalu priyajanecchām evānugacchati sarva-śakti-vyaktir na tu yadṛcchām iti
GK19gp01-11u:1805: [106] atha sarve sāścaryam ūcuḥ - bhavatu nāma tat tat |
GK19gp01-11u:1809: māyika-śāyikāyāṃ jātāyāṃ pūrva-deva-bhiyā dvibhujam atrakīyaṃ bālakam

GK19gp01-11u:3586: [31] tad etad dūragatayā tayā nāvadhāryate sma, kintu parāḥ pāramparyeṇāvadhārya kṛtopālambha-caryāḥ kāścin nikaṭa-nikāyyā nāryaḥ parivārya militāḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3587: sva-vācam iha smārayitum aikāgārikaḥ so' yaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3588: bhavad-agāre' pi kāṃ kārim akārṣīt iti sūcayantya iva saha jahasuś ca |
GK19gp01-11u:3589: [32] tatas tad anavadadhatī kuntala-santāna-bandhād vighaṭitāṃ paṭṭa-ḍorīm
GK19gp01-11u:3590: ekām upasādya, sadyaḥ sadma-dvārāntar upasadyamānam udūkhalam anu
GK19gp01-11u:3591: vatsa-gala-bandhavad alagnam evāvalagne sa-nirbandhaṃ bandhum udyatavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3594: [33] tataś ca tasyā dhammillād udvāsyānyasyā vinyastatve' pi
GK19gp01-11u:3595: tad-avasthatāyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ sāścaryam iva nāry-arpitair manthana-netrair
GK19gp01-11u:3596: bahubhir api pāraṃ na vavrāja vrajeśvarī |
GK19gp01-11u:3599: dṛśyante sma vaṭās tatra vidūrādrau ghanā iva ||JGc_1,8.32|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3600: [34] tad etat paśyantībhiḥ parihasantībhir uktam, vraja-devi, niveditam
GK19gp01-11u:3601: evāsmābhiḥ; sa eṣa samunnatayā mohanatayā kaphallakam api vellayan
GK19gp01-11u:3603: [35] sā prāha-kiṃ jānāty asāv adya-jātaḥ, kintu bhavatīnām eva kāpīyam avadyāvidyā yad antar asya pakṣa-pātinyaḥ samīkṣyadhve, bahir evānyathā vyavahāratayā viharantyaḥ stha |
GK19gp01-11u:3604: [36] sarvāḥ sahāsam ūcuḥ, tatrabhavati, bhavac-caraṇebhyaḥ śapatham
GK19gp01-11u:3605: ācarāmaḥ, nāsmākaṃ vismāpikeyaṃ vidyā vidyate iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3606: [37] sā ca cetasi vicāram ācacāra, tarhi garga-vacana-vargavat sakṛt kāpi bhāgavatī śaktir evāmum avaruṇaddhi, na cāyaṃ kiñcid api jānāti |
GK19gp01-11u:3607: [38] atheyam asyāścaryasya paryantaṃ paryālocituṃ tābhir eva gṛhād anyāny api manthana-dāmāni muhur muhur ānāyya sanirbandhaṃ bandham ādadhaty api
GK19gp01-11u:3610: badhnatī na tu sutaṃ vrajeśvarī pāram āpa tad apāra-karmaṇaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3613: [39] tato yāvad eva yādava-deva-kulajasya tasya haṭhavattāyāṃ prayatnādhīr
GK19gp01-11u:3614: āsīt, tāvat tad-āgraho' pi graha-nigṛhīta ivābhūt |
GK19gp01-11u:3618: anyāni tu sarvāṇi dāmāni tasminn urvaritāny evādṛśyanta |
GK19gp01-11u:3620: yayā tan niṣpādya mātaraṃ praty, api bhrama evāyam iti pratyayaḥ pratyaham
GK19gp01-11u:3625: śikṣāṃ ghaṭayantī nija-kaṭhinatām eva tasmin haṭhini prakaṭayantī tābhir vihasantībhiḥ saha sa-narma-geha-karmaṇe gacchantī, tat-paripālanāya
GK19gp01-11u:3627: [43] tataś ca gatāsu tāsu kṣaṇaṃ kṛta-rodana-vinodaḥ, paścād bahala-khalaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3628: praty udūkhala-nodanāya labdha-modaḥ sa tu baddha eva
GK19gp01-11u:3630: khelann ulūkhalam etaṃ laghu laghu cālayām āsa, hārayāmāsa ca tair
GK19gp01-11u:3634: tat-karṣaṇa-maya-harṣa-prada-līlayā na ca kareṇa na cāpareṇa tad-uddāna-mocana-rocanatām avāpa |
GK19gp01-11u:3635: [44] tatra tu pura-dvāra-purastād-varti vātāvarta-vartita-nartanam iva yamalam arjuna-dvayam asya netra-vartmani vartate sma |
GK19gp01-11u:3636: krameṇa cāsau tayor antara eva vikramate sma iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3637: [45] etāvan mukta-kaṇṭham uṭṭaṅkayan snigdhakaṇṭhas tad-bhañjane kāraṇaṃ harer aiśvarya-pracāraṇam iti tat pratārayan kāraṇāntaram eva vyājahāra-
GK19gp01-11u:3638: [46] tataḥ sphuṭaṃ jhaṭiti parataḥ paryaṭitum utkaṇṭhayā
GK19gp01-11u:3641: [47] atha sphuṭam asau vaṭītroṭanecchayā tat kṛṣṭavān |
GK19gp01-11u:3646: na dhī-dhṛtiṃ vadhira-vimugdhatām adhi vrajann adhi vrajam adadhāt prajā-vrajaḥ ||JGc_1,8.34||
GK19gp01-11u:3655: [49] atha tayor atyūrjitena visphūrjitena muhūrtārdham ārtatayā
GK19gp01-11u:3658: sā tu tal-līlā-mādhurī-dhurīṇatayā citrākṛtir iva mitrāvalī na vitrāsam āsasāda |
GK19gp01-11u:3660: sambhrama-kāry avadhārya tu vraja-pati-mukhās tarkita-mukhās tad evābhipratasthire |
GK19gp01-11u:3662: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā |
GK19gp01-11u:3663: vinā hasti-kṛtaṃ doṣaṃ kenemau pātitau drumau? ||JGc_1,8.37|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3665: tasmāt tasmān mahā-garjān mūrcchām ārcchan vraje janāḥ ||JGc_1,8.38|| iti

GK19gp01-11u:3675: [54] sa-rodana-vadanaṃ vadanaṃ cumban vidann api muhuḥ papraccha ca, putra, kutratyaḥ sa khalu
GK19gp01-11u:3676: khala-buddhir yena colūkhale nirbandha-janita-baddhas tvam asi? iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3677: [55] sa tu pitari rataś cirataḥ śliṣṭa-kaṇṭhatayābhyarṇam āgataḥ karṇe varṇayāmāsa, tāta, mātaiva iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3678: [56] pitā tu tāṃ pūrvaṃ vigata-saṃvedatayā anantaraṃ tu svata eva
GK19gp01-11u:3680: tata eva na sahasā rahasāpi paribhāṣitum iyeṣa |
GK19gp01-11u:3681: ajñatayāvajñayā na ca papraccha bālakān, kim idaṃ vṛttam? iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3682: [57] te tu svayam evocuḥ, sphuṭam anena kṛta-madhya-gamanena
GK19gp01-11u:3683: vistīrṇa-khale pura-sthale krīḍituṃ niṣkramya, vikṛṣṭa-tale tiryag-bhāvād
GK19gp01-11u:3684: acale cāsminn ulūkhale khaṭat-khaṭiti truṭitatām ṛcchat kuṭha-dvayaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3686: [58] tataś ca khaṇḍitābhyām ābhyāṃ nirgatya kaṭaka-mukuṭa-kuṇḍalādi-maṇḍitau rociṣmad-vapuṣmantau śuṣmāṇau praṇamantau samantād etaṃ kim api santoṣayāmāsatuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3688: [59] tad etad ākalya, bālānāṃ pralāpo' yam iti vatsalāḥ kalayāmbabhūvuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3690: [60] tataś ca kramād eka-dvy-ādi-prakramān militena vraja-janena samaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3691: vraja-bhūpālaḥ sva-bālakenāṅkaṃ sad alaṅkṛtya nitya-kṛtya-kṛte kālindīm anuvindamānas tenānuṣajya nimajya tatraiva vipraiḥ svasti-vācanādikam
GK19gp01-11u:3692: ācarya, mahā-dānādikaṃ visarjya, nikāyyam āsajya ca, pūrvāhna-bhojanāya
GK19gp01-11u:3694: [61] taj-jāyā tu taj-jābhyāṃ duḥkha-lajjābhyāṃ sajjatī gṛhād āgrahāc ca na niṣkrāntavatī, na ca gṛhāgatāḥ sambhāṣitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:3696: nivṛttāsu, samādhānohinī rohiṇī gaurava-pātrībhiḥ paurogavībhiḥ pariveṣayāmāsa |

GK19gp01-11u:3700: samyag-īdṛg-auśīra-sukha-dhīra-cetā gavāgamana-ramya-samaye gosthānam āgamya go-dohanādi-kāryaṃ ca kārayati sma |
GK19gp01-11u:3702: ānāyya tayā sahitaṃ suhitaṃ saha sa-vayobhis tanayau

GK19gp01-11u:3707: tadīya-santata-sukhābhīkāḥ svakula-māṇikya-lakṣmyaḥ sarvāḥ prāmāṇikyaḥ samāsādya nivedavatyaḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:3708: [65] rājan, kṛṣṇa-janany adya na bhuktavatī, na kenacid uktavatī ca vartate |
GK19gp01-11u:3709: tām anu sarvāś ca tathā vartante |
GK19gp01-11u:3710: [66] vrajarājas saha-duḥkha-hāsam uvāca-vayaṃ kiṃ kurmaḥ? roṣam anuvartamānā svayam eva sva-doṣaṃ paśyatu |

GK19gp01-11u:3713: [68] vrajarājas tu sa-smitaḥ sutam apṛcchat, sva-mātaraṃ yāsyasi?
GK19gp01-11u:3714: [69] kṛṣṇa uvāca-nahi nahi, kintu tvām eva samayā samayān gamayiṣyāmi |
GK19gp01-11u:3715: [70] atha rāja-jyāyaḥ-prajāvatyaḥ sahāsam ūcuḥ-stanaṃ kasya pāsyasi?

GK19gp01-11u:3722: [76] tad etad ākarṇya sāsrā rohiṇī nīcair uvāca-putra, kathaṃ kaṭhorāyase?
GK19gp01-11u:3724: [77] kṛṣṇas tad etad aśrṇvann iva sāsraṃ pitṛ-mukham īkṣate sma |
GK19gp01-11u:3725: rohiṇī tu saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tasya saṅkarṣaṇāya sañjñayā jñāpayāmāsa |

GK19gp01-11u:3729: kṛta-bāṣpa-vṛṣṭiṃ tad-dṛṣṭim eva paśyaṃs tam atīva vaśyam ācarann āsīt |
GK19gp01-11u:3730: [78] vraja-rājas tu mātary antaḥ-sneham asya paryālocya tad abhivyaktaye hastaṃ kiñcid udastaṃ vidhāyābhidadhe-putra, yadi vakṣi, tarhi bāḍhaṃ tāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3732: kṛṣṇas tu tad asahamānas tasya hastaṃ stambhayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:3734: vraja-rājaḥ punar vihasya nija-vatsalatayātīva sadayaṃ tadīya-mātur api hṛdayam adhiyan-putra, tava mātā yady evaṃ bhaviṣyati, tadā kiṃ kariṣyasi?
GK19gp01-11u:3735: ity anadhātor viruddhārthaṃ prayujya sa-parihāsam āha sma |
GK19gp01-11u:3736: [80] kṛṣṇas tu bālaka-bhāvenājasraṃ mātari sa-tṛṣṇaḥ sāsraṃ, kutra me mātā? tatra gamyatām iti sa-śaṅkaṃ rohiṇy-aṅkaṃ gatavān |
GK19gp01-11u:3738: prahasita-kalakaleṣu sakaleṣu parama-sukhārohiṇyā rohiṇyānītaḥ so' pi veśma praviśya sa-rodana-modam ambālā-galaṃ lagnavān |
GK19gp01-11u:3744: [82] atha tāsāṃ tv aneka-sāntvanayā labdha-śāntiḥ kiñcid
GK19gp01-11u:3746: bubhuje ca sahāgrajātena tena parama-hitābhiḥ sahitā |
GK19gp01-11u:3747: [83] tad ārabhya tu saṅkocaṃ upalabhya vrajarāja-locana-gocaratāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3749: dināntare tu pitṛ-nideśa-pāla-bāla-gopālenaiva celāñcale gṛhītvā nītā |
GK19gp01-11u:3751: sa-narmāmodaṃ dāmodaraḥ iti vraja-vadhūbhir āhūyate sma, so' yaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3753: vrajeśvarīṃ stotum apīha kovidaḥ ko vā bhavel lokaga-loka-saṅgrahe |
GK19gp01-11u:3756: [84] so' yam asyā bādarāyaṇinā ghaṭita-samyag-udghaṭṭanaḥ śrīmān
GK19gp01-11u:3757: yaśaḥ-paṭaha-śabdas trailokyam eva ślokyatayā paryaṭann asti |
GK19gp01-11u:3760: [85] śrī-rāmas tu nijānujaṃ sa-tṛṣṇam āha sma, smarasi, bhrātar,
GK19gp01-11u:3762: [86] anujo' pi sa-smitam āha sma, āṃ āṃ, tatra krīḍām api kariṣyāvaḥ iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3765: yau vṛkṣāv api tau svasya divya-bhaktau vinirmame ||JGc_1,8.41||
GK19gp01-11u:3767: [88] tad evaṃ vṛtte vṛtte sarve tat-tat-kathāṃ api tat-tat-parvaivānubhūya
GK19gp01-11u:3773: [1] atha dināntare bhāsamānāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ śrī-vrajarājaḥ paryanuyuktavān,
GK19gp01-11u:3774: vatsa snigdhakaṇṭha, tau khalu vṛkṣau vraje saṅkalpa-pradatayā
GK19gp01-11u:3776: tataḥ prāg-janmani kīdṛśāv, atra vā kasmād āgatau,
GK19gp01-11u:3779: śrī-devarṣi-varye dhārṣṭyam anuṣṭhitavantau santau, pariṇāmataḥ paramānugraheṇa śrī-devarṣi-varya-kṛta-nigraheṇa vṛkṣatāyām api bhavagad-bhaktatām āgatavantau |
GK19gp01-11u:3780: pratibhavad-avatāram udbhavatas tasya bṛhadvana-stha-bhavad-gṛhasya tu sadeśe deśe yamalārjuna-veśena
GK19gp01-11u:3784: samprati tu tad-bhakti-phala-vyaktim apy ākalayantau vartete |
GK19gp01-11u:3785: [3] vrajarājaḥ sakautukam uvāca-kathyatāṃ tathyaṃ, samprati kutra pratiyātau?
GK19gp01-11u:3786: [4] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sva-mukha-kamalaṃ namayitvā tuṣṇīm iva sthitvā ca madhukaṇṭhaṃ kaṭākṣeṇekṣāñcakre |
GK19gp01-11u:3787: [5] vrajarāja uvāca-saṅkucann iva kathaṃ nocitavān asi?
GK19gp01-11u:3788: [6] snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sa-sambhramam uvāca-deva, vayaṃ kiṃ brūmahe?
GK19gp01-11u:3790: [7] vrajarājaḥ sasmitam uvāca-satyaṃ bhavad-uktaṃ punar-uktam eva bhavet,
GK19gp01-11u:3791: yato bhavato maunam evātra bravītīti rīti-vaśāj jñātavanta eva ca vayam |
GK19gp01-11u:3792: tathāpi, sva-mukhena sukhena yojayatu bhavān asmān |
GK19gp01-11u:3794: kṛpaṇa-viṣaya-kṛpā-kpta-tad-etad-gatī labdhamatī tāv eva sphuṭam āvām iti
GK19gp01-11u:3796: samāhūya bhūyaḥ sa-kautukaṃ sa-sukhaṃ tau militavantaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3799: madhukaṇṭhaḥ krama-prāptāṃ kathāṃ prāha, [11] tad evaṃ vicitrāt
GK19gp01-11u:3801: vindamānaḥ sva-patnīṃ papraccha, adya sva-devara-nara-deva-gṛhe kiṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3803: [12] patnī prāha-atha kim, ko vā tad gamanaṃ vinā mano mānayituṃ śaknoti,
GK19gp01-11u:3807: yasmin prema-pracuraṃ bhayam api tasmin vibhāvyate pracuram |
GK19gp01-11u:3808: yadvan netraṃ śaṅkā-viṣayas tadvan na karṇādi ||JGc_1,9.1|| [gīti]
GK19gp01-11u:3809: [15] tathā hi, yadyapi niravadyādhāna-vidhātṛ-mātṛ-prabhṛtibhī rakṣyete sabhībhir eva tau, tathāpi khela-velāyāṃ sambhālayitum apāraṇīyatayā sukalam eva vikalayataḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3812: janitāmodāyāṃ yaśodāyāṃ tadīya-sāhāyakā-rohiṇyām api rohiṇyām āśaṅkā-pātrīr dhātrīr vañcayitvā vidūraṃ cañcitavantau |
GK19gp01-11u:3814: dhātrīṇām aparatra karmaṇi manāg dattātmanām agrataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3815: savyāsavya-dṛśor dṛśor aviṣaye sāntarddhi-deśe ca tau |
GK19gp01-11u:3820: kṛtāvadhāna-sargaḥ śīghram eva kṛtānumārgaḥ krameṇa svasyākāraṇam akāraṇatām āsāditam avadhārya nijeśvaryor āvedayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:3821: [18] tāvac ca tato' py atidūraṃ gambhīra-sarit-tīraṃ gatāv ākarṇya pūtanā-sūdana-prasū rāmāmbālām eva tayoḥ saṅkalanāya cālayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:3823: na jāne khalv arjuna-yugalavad durjana-preryamāṇatayā kaścid anokaho vā

GK19gp01-11u:4622: tasyāpi svasya citra-sthiti-kṛd iti yatas tatra tatrābhyadhāyi
GK19gp01-11u:4624: [36] tad evaṃ hāna-prāyasya tasya hāyanasya pūraṇāya pañcaṣāṇy ahāni yadā
GK19gp01-11u:4626: sva-para-tat-paratāyās teṣu bālādiṣu samyag avagamyamānatayā rāmo' pi vismitya tena saha praśnottare vinimitya viniścitya ca sthitavān, kintu teṣāṃ sakhīnām akhilānāṃ vipralambha-lambhita-kaṣṭena nijānuje ruṣṭatayā pañcaṣāṇy ahāni tena saha vanaṃ nājighāya |
GK19gp01-11u:4627: brahmā tu tatra guptam āgataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇena tarkyate sma, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4628: yasmād eti paraiti paśyati puraḥ paścāt tathā pārśvataḥ svātmānaṃ paritaḥ stṛṇoty anupadaṃ sambhrāmyati bhrāmyati |
GK19gp01-11u:4629: loptrā loptrasa-vatsa-vatsapa-gaṇaṃ sandigdham ālokate tasmān me pratibhāty asāv anudiśaṃ vaktraṃ dadhat stenakaḥ ||JGc_1,11.28||
GK19gp01-11u:4631: [37] atha brahmā teṣām arvācīnānāṃ prācīnānāṃ ca bālādīnāṃ rūpādibhiḥ parasparam abhedam ākalayya cetasāścaryam ācarya cārvācaḥ parivindan,
GK19gp01-11u:4633: [38] brahmāṇaṃ paśyati śrīdāmādi-mitre tu sva-mitrāṇām evānayanecchā jāteti yadṛcchayā
GK19gp01-11u:4636: traptatayānutaptatayā ca yā racitāvācīnatā, sā svayaṃ praṇāmāya pariṇamati sma |
GK19gp01-11u:4638: ekam ekam adhaḥ kṛtvā mukhaṃ tatra caturmukhaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:4641: yadyapi na naman mumude vidhir ekāsyānavāg-bhāvāt |
GK19gp01-11u:4643: [40] athāpakṛṣṭaṃ-manyaḥ sann ananya-gatitayā sumedhā vedhāḥ stavakeneva
GK19gp01-11u:4645: yatra ca caturbhir vaktrair ānuvāna iva nuvann asau sarva-mahān api yat kiñcid gokulānugatānugatim eva prati
GK19gp01-11u:4648: tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kimapy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule' pi katamāṅghri-rajo' bhiṣekam |
GK19gp01-11u:4649: yaj-jīvitaṃ tu nikhilaṃ bhagavān mukundas tv adyāpi yat-pada-rajaḥ śruti-mṛgyam eva ||[BhP 10.14.34] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4652: [42] atha snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-śrīmad-vraja-yuvarājena tatra kim uktam?
GK19gp01-11u:4653: [43] madhukaṇṭhaḥ sa-smitam uvāca-na kim api, kintu tatra stuti-samaye
GK19gp01-11u:4655: govindaḥ smitam atanot stuvānam enam dṛṣṭvā yat kim api dadarśa tatra citram |
GK19gp01-11u:4656: ekasmin vadati caturmukhe hi tasmiṃś catvāro dadhati rutīr iti bhramaḥ syāt ||JGc_1,11.31||
GK19gp01-11u:4658: vayaṃ gopāś cārthavanto brahmā ca tvam anarthavān |
GK19gp01-11u:4659: brūmas tvāṃ kim itīvāyam avadan smitam ātanot ||JGc_1,11.32|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4660: [45] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-parisedhaty api vedhasi kiṃ kiñcid apy uktam?
GK19gp01-11u:4663: paritoṣa-poṣam amanyamānaḥ sa dhanyaḥ svajana-prema-jitaḥ śrīmān ajitas tān vraja-bālādīn evānetuṃ yadā vāñchām ānañca, tadāñjali-bandha-vyañjitāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4664: sañjñām anu samanujñāṃ yācamānaṃ viriñciṃ khalv evaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4666: ājñā vijñāyate, tadā tān pūrvam evānusaṃhitān sannihitān ānayāmi iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4671: svāparādha-maya-bādhā-vyakulatayā ca triḥ parikramya bahuśaḥ praṇamya ca
GK19gp01-11u:4673: [48] śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca manasi tasyāparādhaṃ manāg apy anāgamayann āgamayamānaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4675: [49] tathaiva hi teṣāṃ kāla-deśa-viparyayā paryālocanāya druhiṇa-devena sneha-dehany
GK19gp01-11u:4679: vatsān pulinam āninye yathā pūrva-sakhaṃ svakam ||[BhP 10.14.42] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4681: ūcuś ca suhṛdaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ, svāgataṃ te' tiraṃhasā |
GK19gp01-11u:4682: naiko' py abhoji kavala, ehītaḥ sādhu bhujyatām ||
GK19gp01-11u:4684: darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam ||[BhP 10.14.45-46] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4685: [51] carma cedam etāvantaṃ samayaṃ yathāvad eva yogamāyayāntardhāpitam iti gamyam |
GK19gp01-11u:4687: mahatānandena mahitas tair eva sahitaḥ saṃhita-sampad-vrajaṃ vrajaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4688: praviśan, tat-tad-unmaryāda-vatsa-parāvartanāya nidiśan, pūrva-pūrvato' py apūrvaṃ parva parvati sma |
GK19gp01-11u:4694: [53] tataś ca pitṛ-sambandhibhir nanda-sūnur iti mātṛ-sambandhibhir
GK19gp01-11u:4695: yaśodā-sūnur iti tasya nāmānūdya, sadya eva siddham iti cirantanam api
GK19gp01-11u:4719: [54] iti śrutvā ca te vrajasthāś cintayāmāsuḥ, sādhu-ghātukānāṃ pātukānām āmīṣāṃ katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ? iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4720: [55] tad evaṃ siddhe, sukhānubiddhe teṣāṃ same samāgame prātas tu
GK19gp01-11u:4722: dīyamāna-vismayatayā tān ānīya tena caikatra praṇīya śrīvatsa-vatsaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4724: [56] atha punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ samāpanāya sa-vismayam ivāha sma-
GK19gp01-11u:4727: [57] tad evaṃ kathakayoḥ kathāṃ prathayitvā sabhyeṣu sākṣād iva kalita-tat-tat-keli-sandhayoḥ kṛtāñjali-bandhayos tad-dine' pi pūrvavad eva sarve gṛha-vartmani vartamānā nija-nija-spṛhaṇīyaṃ karma nirmimāṇā api
GK19gp01-11u:4728: tām eva līlāṃ bṛṃhitāṃ hṛdi jagṛhire |
